message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with scene text recognition, which is a computer vision task, hence it is likely to belong to the Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (cs.CV) category. Additionally, the paper proposes a novel attention mechanism to improve the recognition performance, which falls under the Natural Language Processing (cs.CL) category. The paper also introduces a new architecture for the recognition task, which involves learning a more powerful and robust intermediate representation, which could fall under the Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) categories. Finally, the paper evaluates its proposed method on various benchmarks, which could fall under the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) category.
